Function Documentation

void forward_kinematics ( float  tool[],
float  theta[] 
)

Forward kinematic calculations

Parameters:
tool  (Output) array contains the end effector position and orientation coordinates
x[cm], y[cm], z[cm], gamma1[deg] and gamma2[deg]
and the gripper opening
theta  (Input) array contains 5 joint angles theta1[rad] to theta4[rad] and theta6[rad]
and the gripper opening

int inverse_kinematics ( float  tool[],
float  theta[] 
)

Inverse kinematic calculations

Returns:
0 if one of the thetas exceeds its maximal values
1 if all thetas are inside their borders
Parameters:
tool  (Input) array contains the end effector position and orientation coordinates
x[cm], y[cm], z[cm], gamma1[deg] and gamma2[deg]
and the gripper opening
theta  (Output) array contains 5 joint angles theta1[rad] to theta4[rad] and theta6[rad]
and the gripper opening

double sqr ( double  x  ) 

int theta_workspacecheck ( float  theta[]  ) 

Checks if theta[] is inside the reachable space

Returns:
0 if one of the thetas exceeds its maximal values
1 if all thetas are inside their borders
Parameters:
theta  (Input) array contains 5 joint angles theta1[rad] to theta4[rad] and theta6[rad]
